key_facts.fact: Pattern has built connectors for Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon, Arbitrum, and more
key_facts.speaker: Mehrdad

key_facts.fact: Pattern's reach has been extended to include the Ergo ecosystem for this hackathon
key_facts.speaker: Mehrdad

key_facts.fact: Pattern demo site is available at mvp.pattern.global
key_facts.speaker: Mehrdad

key_facts.fact: Pattern can fetch smart contract source code and ABI, invoke contract functions directly, pull transaction histories, and perform on-chain analytics
key_facts.speaker: Mehrdad
